newsletter.title: Subscribe to the newsletter
newsletter.desc: Exploring the JAMstack, static sites, and the future of web development. Subscribe to our newsletter to make sure you don't miss anything.

hero.title: Build, deploy, and manage modern web projects
hero.subtitle: An all-in-one workflow that combines global deployment, continuous integration, and automatic HTTPS. And that’s just the beginning.

post1.title: Deploy CodeSandbox to Netlify
post1.desc: Announcing the CodeSandbox Netlify integration. Create and deploy sites to Netlify directly from within CodeSandbox!
post1.name: David Wells

post2.title: Featured site: Gridsome
post2.desc: A static site generator for the VueJS community. With a pre-generated site hosted on Netlify and optimised for performance.
post2.name: Phil Hawksworth
